trans-unit.source: Enables <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls or other server controls to contain collections of verbs.
trans-unit.target: 可讓<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項或其他伺服器控制項包含的指令動詞的集合。

trans-unit.source: A verb in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls is an action that a user can carry out in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 中的動詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項是使用者可以在使用者介面 (UI) 中執行的動作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a verb is represented in the UI by a clickable control such as a button, a link, or a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，動詞命令會在 UI 來表示可點按的控制項，例如按鈕、 連結或功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set provides standard verbs that are available by default to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls (such as custom, ASP.NET, and user controls) that can act like <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls when placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件控制項集合提供標準動詞命令預設會將所提供之<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項和其他伺服器控制項 （例如自訂 ASP.NET 和使用者控制項），可以像是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項置於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Standard verbs include close, minimize, restore, delete, edit, and export.
trans-unit.target: 標準動詞命令包括關閉、 最小化、 還原、 刪除、 編輯和匯出。

trans-unit.source: You can also create custom verbs for use with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> and server controls.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立搭配使用的自訂動詞命令<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>和伺服器控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The IWebActionable interface, with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property, gives you a way to integrate custom verbs into your controls.
trans-unit.target: IWebActionable 介面，以其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>屬性，可讓您整合您的控制項的自訂動詞命令的方式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class implements the IWebActionable interface and implements its single property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別會實作 IWebActionable 介面並實作其單一內容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To add custom verbs to a control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, you must override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, add custom verbs to a collection, and return the collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入自訂動詞命令，此控制項的繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別，您必須覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，將自訂動詞命令加入至集合，並傳回集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property contains only custom verbs; standard verbs are not included in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 所參考的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性包含僅動詞; 這個集合中不包含的標準動詞命令。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default return value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is `null`, because by default there are no custom verbs in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 預設的傳回值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項是`null`，因為根據預設沒有任何自訂動詞命令集合中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Adding custom verbs to server controls that are not <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls requires one extra step.
trans-unit.target: 加入伺服器控制項所沒有的自訂動詞命令<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項需要一個額外的步驟。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In those cases, the controls must also implement the IWebActionable interface and implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下，控制項必須也實作 IWebActionable 介面和實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: After you have added custom verbs to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> collection, the Web Parts control set automatically handles the other steps necessary to create and render the custom verbs.
trans-unit.target: 加入自訂動詞之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>集合，自動設定這個 Web 組件控制項負責建立及呈現的自訂動詞命令所需的其他步驟。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考的自訂集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The Verbs property references a collection of custom verbs (if any) that are added to a verbs menu in the header of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control.
trans-unit.target: Verbs 屬性集合的自訂動詞命令 （如果有的話） 的參考加入至動詞命令功能表中的標頭<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或其他伺服器控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The Verbs collection does not contain references to the standard <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects provided with the Web Parts control set, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 動詞集合未包含標準參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>物件提供的 Web 組件控制項的設定，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>

trans-unit.source: Developers who want to add custom verbs to a custom control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class can simply override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> property that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class implements.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員想要加入自訂動詞命令，以自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別只可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別會實作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Developers who want to add custom verbs to a user control, or a custom control that is not a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface by providing an implementation of the Verbs property.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員想要加入使用者控制項或不是自訂控制項的自訂動詞命令<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，必須實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>藉由提供的 Verbs 屬性實作的介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"></xref> that contains custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含自訂<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref>物件。
